thread.title: Emilia Clarke named Esquire's 'Sexiest Woman Alive'
thread.title_full: Emilia Clarke named Esquire's 'Sexiest Woman Alive'

title: Emilia Clarke named Esquire's 'Sexiest Woman Alive'
text:
Emilia Clarke named Esquire's 'Sexiest Woman Alive' 'Game of Thrones' actress continues big year UPDATED 11:56 AM EDT Oct 13, 2015 Meet Esquire's new 'Sexiest Woman Alive' 1 of 13 Emilia Clarke, Game of Thrones premiere 
2015: Actress Emilia Clarke Next Sexiest Woman - Penelope Cruz Emilia Clarke's big year keeps on going, with the "Game of Thrones" actress being named Esquire's "Sexiest Woman Alive." More The 28-year-old London native was announced as Esquire's choice early Tuesday morning. She appears nude on the cover of the magazine, laying belly down with a bedsheet strategically covering her body. Clarke, who plays Daenerys Targaryen, aka Khaleesi, on the HBO drama, was also chosen as "Woman of the Year" by GQ in September. The accolades come in a year that also saw her star in her first big blockbuster movie, appearing as Sarah Connor alongside Arnold Schwarzenegger in this summer's "Terminator: Genisys." 
Clarke succeeds Spanish actress and model Penelope Cruz, whom Esquire selected in 2014. Previous winners include Scarlett Johansson, Mila Kunis and Rihanna.
